DHD7.defaultvalues: ,,,,,,,,,=select ton_tt from tontucthoi where ma_vt='[ma_vt]' and ma_kho ='[ma_kho]' and ma_tt1 ='[ma_tt1]' and ma_tt2 ='[ma_tt2]' and ma_tt3 ='[ma_tt3]' and ma_tt4 ='[ma_tt4]' and ma_tt5 ='[ma_tt5]',,,=[gia_ban_nt]*{ty_gia},=[sl_nhap]*[gia_ban_nt],=[tien_nt1]*{ty_gia} ![sl_nhap]![gia_ban]![gia_ban_nt],,,,,=[tien_nt1] * [ty_le_ck]/100 ![sl_nhap]![gia_ban_nt]![ma_vt],=[tien_ck_ct_nt]!M[ty_gia] ![sl_nhap]![gia_ban_nt]![ma_vt],,,,=([tien_nt1] - [tien_ck_ct_nt])*[thue_suat]/100![gia_ban_nt]![sl_nhap]![ma_thue]![ty_le_ck],=[tien_thue_nt]*{ty_gia} ![tien_nt1]![thue_suat]![gia_ban_nt]![gia_ban]![sl_nhap]![ma_thue]![ty_le_ck]![tien_ck_ct_nt],,,=[tien_nt1] - [tien_ck_ct_nt] + [tien_thue_nt] ![thue_suat]![gia_ban_nt]![gia_ban]![sl_nhap]![ma_thue]![ty_le_ck],=[t_hd_nt]*M[ty_gia] ![thue_suat]![gia_ban_nt]![gia_ban]![sl_nhap]![ma_thue]![ty_le_ck]![tien_ck_ct_nt]![tien_nt1]![tien_thue_nt],1,,=[gia_von_nt] ![pn_gia_tb],=[gia_von_nt]*[sl_nhap] ![pn_gia_tb],=[tien_nhap_nt] ![sl_nhap]![gia_von_nt]![pn_gia_tb],= exec get_tk_vt @M[ma_dvcs]%p@[ma_kho]%p@[ma_vt],
